Paragraph: Infants were assigned to the cocaine - exposed group if there was a maternal history of cocaine abuse during pregnancy or if maternal or neonatal urine toxicology results were positive at the time of delivery .

In this paragraph, the only disease entity mentioned is "cocaine abuse". The paragraph describes infants being assigned to a group based on their mothers' history of cocaine abuse during pregnancy or positive urine toxicology results for cocaine at the time of delivery. Therefore, the disease entity is accurately represented as "Cocaine abuse".
